ComicInfo.Summary:
Augury: Patrick visits the mysterious Curator and asks him to divine the future for Sara and the Witchblade.
War of the Witchblades Part 1: Sara and Hope visit Julie in prison. Danielle and Finch chat about the Witchblade and their relationship. Sara and Patrick chase down a killer "vampire" who turns out to be a goth punk with a peeping tom addiction. The forces of darkness and light conspire against the bearers of the Witchblade.
ComicInfo.Tags: Magdalena (cameo),Witchblade [Sara Pezzini] (cameo),Darkness [Jackie Estacado] (cameo),Witchblade [Danielle Baptiste] (cameo),The Curator (guest),Patrick Gleason
ComicInfo.Title: Augury; War of the Witchblades Part 1
